verses.roman:
eka-kāle vaiśākhera paurṇamāsī-dine
rātri-kāle mahāprabhu calilā udyāne

synonyms: eka-kāle—at one time; vaiśākhera—of the month of Vaiśākha, (April-May); paurṇamāsī-dine—on the full-moon night; rātri-kāle—at night; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; calilā—went; udyāne—to a garden.
translation: One full-moon night in the month of Vaiśākha [April and May], Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went to a garden.
